title: Collect and Analyze Control Environment Survey Data
description: As part of an audit, the team sends a survey to employees to gauge their perception of the company's control environment.

tasks.description: Develop a survey questionnaire with questions about ethics, management oversight, and communication.
Distribute the survey to all employees in the department being audited.
Analyze the anonymous survey results, noting that a high percentage of respondents feel pressure to meet unrealistic targets.
tasks.expected_outcome: The survey analysis reveals a potential risk area to focus on during the audit.
